questions.qText: Find the order and degree of the differential equation: \[ \sqrt{\frac{d^2 y}{dx^2}} = \sqrt[3]{\frac{dy}{dx} + 3} \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the order and degree of the differential equation: \[ \sqrt{\frac{d^2 y}{dx^2}} = \sin\left(\frac{dy}{dx}\right) \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the order and degree of the differential equation: \[ \frac{dy}{dx} = \sqrt{3x + 5} \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the order and degree of the differential equation: \[ \left( \frac{d^2 y}{dx^2} \right)^2 + x^2 \left( \frac{dy}{dx} \right)^6 + 4y = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the order and degree of the differential equation: \[ \frac{dy}{dx} = \sqrt{y} \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the order and degree of the differential equation: \[ \sqrt{1 - x^2} + \sqrt{1 - y^2} \frac{dy}{dx} = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Form the differential equation of the family of curves: \[ x^2 y = a e^x \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Form the differential equation for circles touching two given parallel lines \( y = \pm a \). (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the order of the differential equation of the curve: \[ y = C_1 \sin^2 x + C_2 \cos 2x + C_3 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the order of the differential equation of the family of parabolas having fixed directrix. (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Form the differential equation by eliminating constants in: \[ x^2 - y^2 = c(x^2 + y^2)^2 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Form the differential equation by eliminating constants in: \[ y = e^{-2x} (A \cos 2x + B \sin 2x) \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \frac{dy}{dx} = 2xy \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \frac{dy}{dx} + \frac{x e^x \sqrt{1 - y^2}}{y} = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Verify that \( y = \sin^{-1} x \) is a solution of \[ \frac{d^2 y}{dx^2} = \frac{x}{(1 - x^2)^{3/2}} \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
qOptions: No, it is not a solution

questions.qText: Verify that \( y = \tan x + \sec x \) is a solution of \[ \frac{d^2 y}{dx^2} = \frac{\cos x}{(1 - \sin x)^2} \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
qOptions: No, it is not a solution
It satisfies only for x ≠ π/2

questions.qText: Verify that \( y = x + \tan x \) is a solution of \[ \cos^2 x \frac{d^2 y}{dx^2} - 2(y - x) = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
qOptions: No, it is not a solution
It satisfies only for x ≠ π/2

questions.qText: Solve the differential equation: \[ (x + y) \frac{dy}{dx} = 4x + y \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ (x + y) dx + (x - y) dy = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ (x - 3y + 4) dy - (2x - 6y + 7) dx = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \frac{dy}{dx} = x \cot \frac{y}{x} + y \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ (x^2 - y^2) dx + 2xy dy = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \frac{dy}{dx} = \sin(x + y) \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \frac{dy}{dx} + 2xy = x^3 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ x \frac{dy}{dx} = x + y \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \frac{dy}{dx} + (\sec x) y = \tan x \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ y \frac{dy}{dx} = 1 + y^2 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \frac{dy}{dx} + \frac{y}{x} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1 + x^2}} \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ y dx - x dy + (\log x) dx = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ (x + \ln y) dy + y dx = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
qOptions: \[ x y + y \ln y - y = c \]
\[ x y + y \ln y + y = c \]
\[ x y - y \ln y - y = c \]
\[ x y - y \ln y + y = c \]

questions.qText: Solve the differential equation: \[ y dx - x dy + y^2 \cos x dx = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \frac{d^2 y}{dx^2} = \sec^2 x \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \frac{d^2 y}{dx^2} = \sin x + e^x \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
qOptions: \[ y = e^x - \sin x + c_1 x + c_2 \]
\[ y = e^x + \sin x + c_1 x + c_2 \]
\[ y = e^x - \cos x + c_1 x + c_2 \]
\[ y = e^x + \cos x + c_1 x + c_2 \]

questions.qText: A moth-ball loses volume by evaporation at a rate proportional to its instantaneous surface area. If the radius decreases from 2 cm to 1 cm in 3 months, how long will it take until the ball has practically gone? (Options are generated; one is correct.)

A tangent at a point P on the curve cuts the x-axis at A, and B is the foot of perpendicular from P on the x-axis. If the midpoint of AB is fixed at (α, 0) for any point P, find the curve. (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the family of curves which are orthogonal to the family of curves \( y = k x^2 \). (Options are generated; one is correct.)

The population of a city increases at a rate proportional to the number of inhabitants. If the population was 200,000 in 1990 and 250,000 in 2000, what will be the population in 2010? (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the order and degree of the differential equation: \[ \frac{d^4 y}{dx^4} + \sin \left( \frac{d^3 y}{dx^3} \right) = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the order and degree of the differential equation: \[ \left( \frac{d^2 y}{dx^2} \right)^2 + \left( \frac{dy}{dx} \right)^3 + \sin y = 0 \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find the differential equation corresponding to \[ y^2 = 4a(x + a) \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find a one-parameter family of solutions of: \[ \frac{dy}{dx} = e^{x+y} + e^{-x+y} \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Find a one-parameter family of solutions of: \[ e^{-y} \sec^2 y  dy = dx + x  dy \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ x^2 \frac{d^2 y}{dx^2} = \log x \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \frac{d^2 y}{dx^2} = \sin^2 x \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)

The slope of tangent at any point (x, y) of a curve is given by \( \frac{2}{y-2} \) and it passes through (1, 2). Find the area of the region bounded by the curve and the line \( 2x - y - 4 = 0 \). (Options are generated; one is correct.)
Solve the differential equation: \[ \cos(y-x) \frac{dy}{dx} - x \sin(y-x) = \cos(y-x) \] (Options are generated; one is correct.)
